description: CROSSPATHS is an exciting Christian matchmaking dating app, developed with the latest technology to analyze thousands of profiles and provide the best matches for you. Find your Christian soulmate in a new way! Download the free dating app to search, match, and chat with Christian singles near you today!   Enjoy CROSSPATHS Free Christian Dating apps exclusive features:    Filter based on Christian beliefs and values, age, location, and more - find Christian women and men that match your interests. Many Christian singles near you are waiting for you to connect & meet online in CROSSPATHS Free Christian Dating app!    Experience new and exciting ways to find Christian matches - the Most Eligible tab offers a list of the most popular profiles on CROSSPATHS   Feel like trying something different? Try browsing profiles outside your search preferences in the Explore tab - you never know who youll meet! Thousands of God loving singles are waiting for you!   Upgrade to CROSSPATHS First Class for premium features including:    Boost my profile - You can make your profile stand out from the crowd and be seen twice as often!  Passport - Swipe anywhere in the world by changing your location and multiplying your Christian matches!  Optimize Your Photo - Test which of your photos is getting you the most matches and choose the best one to find your true Christian love!  Read receipts in chat - Check out when your messages have been delivered and read.  Swipe Note - Send a personalized note along with your picture to get the conversation started.  Super Swipe  Let that special someone know you super like them. Find your Christian soulmate in a fun way!   How does it work?   Once you log In, you can instantly start browsing Christian women and men near you   Swipe Right or left on thousands of profiles who share the same Christian beliefs & faith in Jesus. Receive a match when you both swipe right!   Have fun chatting instantly with your Christian matches and connect with new people every day!   Connect with Facebook and start meeting new people easily  Download today and begin swiping Christian singles off their feet! Find Christian love with this matchmaking dating app!  Have questions or want to contact us?  Privacy Policy: http://crosspathsapp.com/privacy/  Terms of Service: http://www.crosspathsapp.com/terms-of-service/  We love feedback!
